verbose_text: Remarkably, using ubiquitin mutants that each contain only a single Lys residue (K *), we found that only co-expression of K11 * and K33 * was sufficient for stabilization and ubiquitylation of both c-Myc (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG), and beta-catenin (XREF_FIG and XREF_FIG).
evidence: ubiquitylation of both c-Myc ( XREF_FIG  and  XREF_FIG ), and beta-catenin
